WHICH BUSINESSES HAVE WE HELPED?

Here are just a few of the industries we work with...

Healthcare

The healthcare industry, has many challenges and requirements other industries don't have. A healthcare business needs to be setup with the right software and procedures, and thats where Bounty Bookkeeping can help.

Here are just a few ways we can help your healthcare practice:

  • Help you choose the right software to look after your accounts.
  • Getting the information you need from your accounting software
  • Help establish good bookkeeping practices through initial and ongoing training

BUILDING & CONSTRUCTION

If youâ€™re like a lot construction businesses, you might still do your books by hand. Problem is, the combination of human error and time constraints of a busy business can lead to errors and unpaid accounts.

Poor bookkeeping can lead to all sorted of challenges, here are a few we hear about quite a lot:

  • Overdue invoices from customers and late payments to suppliers and contractors
  • Lack of solid record keeping (leading difficulties when BAS time comes)
  • Lack of understanding of Taxable Payment Reporting (leading to costly and time-consuming problems with the ATO)

Retail

Starting and running a retail business is both exciting and demanding. You will need to be considering trading hours, rents, seasonal trade and the challenge of casual and part time staff. In addition, you have all the usual small business compliance issues of GST, BAS and PAYG.

Bounty Bookkeeping can help take the stress and headaches out of running a business. Here's just a few of the ways we can help:

  • We can take care of your business Accounts Receivables & Payable
  • Complete and submit your Business & Instalment Activity Statements
  • Help keeping your Staff Payroll and Superannuation in order
  • Supply Software Solutions & train your staff to use them
